          '< Server: openresty\r\n' +
          '< Date: Wed, 09 Apr 2025 13:42:28 GMT\r\n' +
          '< Content-Type: text/html\r\n' +
          '< Content-Length: 0\r\n' +
          '< Connection: keep-alive\r\n' +
          '< \r\n' +
          '* Connection #0 to host api.videe.tv left intact\n'
      },
      source: 'request'
    }
  }
}
